name: atlas-gtm
description: AI-first GTM Operations System - Same agents, different brains for rapid market validation
author: CodesDevs

scripts.dev:all:start: concurrently -n 'docker,mcp,api,ui,lead,reply,meet,learn' -c 'gray,magenta,blue,cyan,green,yellow,red,white' 'bun run docker:up' 'bun run mcp:rest' 'bun run dev:dashboard-api' 'bun run dev:dashboard-ui' 'bun run agent:lead-scorer' 'bun run agent:reply-handler' 'bun run agent:meeting-prep' 'bun run agent:learning-loop'
scripts.dev:all: bun run kill-ports && bun run dev:all:start
scripts.dev:services:start: concurrently -n 'mcp,api,ui,lead,reply,meet,learn' -c 'magenta,blue,cyan,green,yellow,red,white' 'bun run mcp:rest' 'bun run dev:dashboard-api' 'bun run dev:dashboard-ui' 'bun run agent:lead-scorer' 'bun run agent:reply-handler' 'bun run agent:meeting-prep' 'bun run agent:learning-loop'
scripts.dev:services: bun run kill-ports && bun run dev:services:start
scripts.dev:agents:start: concurrently -n 'lead,reply,meet,learn' -c 'green,yellow,red,white' 'bun run agent:lead-scorer' 'bun run agent:reply-handler' 'bun run agent:meeting-prep' 'bun run agent:learning-loop'
scripts.dev:agents: bun run kill-ports && bun run dev:agents:start
scripts.dev:dashboard: bun run kill-ports && bun run dev:dashboard:start
scripts.mcp:dev: cd mcp-servers && uv run python -m atlas_gtm_mcp
scripts.mcp:rest: cd mcp-servers && uv run python -m atlas_gtm_mcp rest
scripts.setup: bun install && cd mcp-servers && uv sync
